title: Agyemang tops ratings in England win over Italy
summary: Rate the players out of 10 in England's Euro 2025 semi-final against Italy.

title: 'So proud to be English right now' - Kelly
summary: Chloe Kelly says she is so proud to be part of this "special team" after her extra-time goal secures England's place in the Women's Euro 2025 final.

title: 'Cool cat' Curtis ignites Martin's Rangers reign
summary: Teenage forward Findlay Curtis repays new head coach Russell Martin's show of faith with a key role in Rangers' crucial first-leg win over Panathinaikos in Champions League qualifying.

title: 'We keep going until the final whistle' - Wiegman
summary: England coach Sarina Wiegman praises the resilience her side showed as the Lionesses beat Italy 2-1 in extra time to book their place in the final of Euro 2025.

title: 'It's beyond what I could ever imagine' - Agyemang reflects on Euros journey
summary: England striker Michelle Agyemang says her journey with England during Euro 2025 is "beyond what she could ever imagine" after her equalising goal helps the Lionesses beat Italy to advance to Sunday's final.
